segments.text: I see the details of this kitchen drawing clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands at the sink, attending to her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows from the basin, creating a stream down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the floor around her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on the stool, hand inside the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool leans backward slightly, unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches toward the jar, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinet doors reveal the jar's contents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window offers a view of the tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a charming domestic moment, despite the small oversights.
